member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:StratTicTacToe.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager

member.name: P:StratTicTacToe.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: M:StratTicTacToe.Game.ClearAll
member.summary: set all boards to empty, allow players to click on any tile, and set the player to "X" 0=empty,1=x,2=0

member.name: M:StratTicTacToe.Game.CheckWin(System.Int16[0:,0:])
member.summary: checks if a player has won on the inputed game and is to be run after every turn Returns 0 if no winner, 1 if winner, 2 if tie
member.returns: Returns True if the game of Tic-Tac-Toe is won, False otherwise

member.name: M:StratTicTacToe.Game.ChangePlayer
member.summary: changes information to identify which player's turn it is

member.name: M:StratTicTacToe.Game.ChangeKey(System.Int16,System.Int16)
member.summary: changes clickKey to give access to certain tiles clickKey is coordinates of the game on the bigBoard
member.param: Vertical coordinate for the game being redirected to
Horizontal coordinate for the game being redirected to

member.param: Vertical coordinate of game being highlighted
